scripts.build: npm run extern && npm run app
scripts.extern: browserify --debug --plugin [minifyify --map extern.js.map --output build/extern.js.map] -r react -r react-dom -o build/extern.js
scripts.app: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ react ] ] -x react -x react-dom src/index.js -o build/app.js
